channel.title: ChromeOS on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in ChromeOS on Error States

item.title: 010 - Bad Gym Decision
item.description: 2019.11.28 Wifi Problem? Or did the Smart TV go into screensaver mode and accidently unlock a bunch of back-end options? Either way, looks like Gym Decision connected their window-display smart TV to the public Spectrum Wifi and never looked back. The alert has been there for four days now and it’s right next to the front door.
